reviewText: One of my favorites of his. The quality of the picture is a little off but that might have to do with the original film.
I am so happy that these are available.... clean hilarious comedy!!
Great Cantinflas film, we play it (over and over) for my mother in law.  Good quality DVD, cute movie.
It is always a pleasure to watch "Cantinflas"
I liked all parts of the movie, but this was not his best work.  Of course, when you've seen many of his movies, you understand that not all of them can be perfect.

Mario Moreno Cantinflas from Mexico, this is one the great movies he made, you will laugh a lot. Just looking his body language is fantastic. You will enjoy if you know Spanish, but even you understand a little you will laugh. Charles Chaplin call him the best comedian in the world. And you will agree after seeing the movie. Happy laughs.
